trans-unit.source: Allows [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications to disable dots per inch (dpi) awareness for all user interface elements.
trans-unit.target: Tillater [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] programmer for 책 deaktivere punkt per tomme taktikker for alle elementer i brukergrensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications are dpi aware, which affects how user interface layout is calculated.
trans-unit.target: Som standard [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] programmene er klar, PPT som p책virker hvordan brukeren grensesnittet oppsettet er beregnet.

trans-unit.source: However, an application can disable dpi awareness by adding the DisableDpiAwarenessAttribute to the application assembly.
trans-unit.target: Et program kan imidlertid deaktivere ppt informasjon om ved 책 legge til DisableDpiAwarenessAttribute programmet-samlingen.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > It is **not** recommended that you set this attribute for your application, unless you need all user interface elements of your application to be non-dpi aware.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Den **ikke** anbefales at du angir dette attributtet for programmet, med mindre du m책 alle elementer i brukergrensesnittet for programmet skal ikke ppt bruker.
